context: I neglected to inform you about important changes
letters:
Dear [Client's Name],

I hope this message finds you well. I am writing to sincerely apologize for not informing you about the important changes that have recently occurred. It was entirely my oversight, and I deeply regret any confusion or inconvenience this may have caused.

Communication is vital in our partnership, and I understand that my failure to relay this information may have impacted your experience. Please know that I take this matter seriously and am committed to improving our communication moving forward. 

I appreciate your understanding and patience in this matter. If there is anything I can do to assist you further or clarify any questions you may have, please do not hesitate to reach out.

Thank you for your continued trust and support.

Warm regards,

[Your Name]  
[Your Position]  
[Your Company]
